name: portfolio_project
description: Portfolio project with React, Express, and MongoDB

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.prod: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start" "npm run preview"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
